itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: Ivor Bennett (16 June 1913 – 16 June 2003) was a Welsh rugby union, and professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1930s and 1940s. He played representative level rugby union (RU) for Wales, and at club level for Aberavon RFC, as a prop, i.e. number 1 or 3, and club level rugby league (RL) for Warrington (Heritage № 423), as a second-row.
